transcripts.text: Hello and welcome back to No Bullshit.  Today we return to talking about the cast of the upcoming Marvel Cinematic Universe comic book movie, Avengers Endgame.  Particularly, we're going to talk more about how it seems like a lot of the cast is not a big fan of Brie Larson, aka the actress playing Captain Marvel.  Last time we went over her in some of her interviews, where Chris Hemsworth, the actor who plays Thor, well, he was clearly not liking how cocky, arrogant, and self-centered Larson was being.  That's why Chris started calling her out in the interview, trying to put Brie Larson back in her place.  Which is probably the kid.  First, she was saying how her character is the strongest of all, which Hemsworth quickly rebuked, as he should.  His character is, in fact, much stronger.  And then, later, Larson even tried to brag about doing her own stunts in the movies.  Chris eventually called her on this, too, saying, what?  Do you think you're Tom Cruise or something?  Tom Cruise, of course, is another actor who is known for doing his own stunts.  a feat which he pushes himself to do to make his movies more realistic and exciting.  Larson, on the other hand, does it so she can brag about it, and so she could try and look cool and better than everyone else in interviews like this, even though her self-done stunts really don't add much to the kinds of movies she's in.  Furthermore, since this Chris and Brie interview started trending, Some people have been pointing out the fact that Larson's claim isn't even entirely true.  Here you can see she clearly has a stunt double in this picture.  So I don't know if it was just for one shot or scene or something, but obviously she's not doing all of her own stunts.  Not if we can so easily find pics of her with stunt doubles around.  It's also worth noting that there were rumors back in January that Marvel had to hire a butt double for Brie, because she has a flat ass.  I covered that part of her story in my first Captain Marvel video back then, and while it's not a stunt double per se, it's still pretty interesting and also kind of hilarious.  But it wasn't just Chris Hemsworth who was giving Brie Larson a pushback. As you can see from this clip we went over before, Don was not into Brie touching him and asking for encouragement at the time.  Let's go ahead and take a look at this clip again real quick so you know what I'm talking about.
